title: Lana's Awakening
description: Inspired by True Real Life Events…  Something dark is awakened inside of her, an unknown desire. Her need for submission takes her down a winding path of pain and pleasure, as she comes to grips with her carnal lust, and her need to have it satisfied. Her captor awoke a sexual beast he hadn’t expected, and no one is prepared for the new Lana Martin.
author: Kristin Elyon
